Putting it all Together

Let's see all these bits and bobs together in action!

Assemblies

We've seen all the individual parts "in a vacuum"... But will they play nicely together? Let's find out!

Assembly 1

This page is modeled loosely after the Individual Exchange "My Household" page, and contains one or more examples of the following elements:

  • Global Navigation
  • Vertical Sub-Navigation ("Dark" version)
  • Drawers
  • Images
  • Illustrations
  • Popovers
  • Tables
  • Alerts
  • Modals
  • Smaller atomic parts:
    • Buttons
    • Icons
    • Various typographical elements and treatments
Launch Assembly 1

Assembly 2

This page is the same as Assembly 1, but uses the "Light" variation of the sub-navigation.

Launch Assembly 2

Assembly 3

This page is modeled loosely after the Individual Exchange "Overview" (post-authenticaion 'home') page, and contains one or more examples of the following elements:

  • Global Navigation
  • Content Sections
  • Tab Panel
  • Illustrations
  • Tables
  • Tooltips
  • Wells
  • Smaller atomic parts:
    • Buttons
    • Lists
Launch Assembly 3

Assembly 4

This page is modeled loosely after the Individual Exchange Plan Details page, and contains one or more examples of the following elements:

  • Global Navigation
  • Horizontal Sub-Navigation ("Dark" version)
  • Content Sections
  • Images
  • Tables
  • Popovers
  • Wells
  • Smaller atomic parts:
    • Buttons
    • Icons
Launch Assembly 4

Assembly 5

This page is the same as Assembly 4, but uses the "Light" variation of the sub-navigation.

Launch Assembly 5
